Server

Class StudentThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.StudentThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public class StudentThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    Student thread runs the server operations for the student client. Client sends a operation which acts as a command for the thread to execute the proper method to communicate with the database and client.
    Author:
    Justin, Magnus, Robert

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface Data.Constants

        ACTIVATE_ASSIGN, ACTIVATE_COURSE, ALL_STUDENTS, CREATE_COURSE, DEACTIVATE_ASSIGN, DEACTIVATE_COURSE, DOWNLOAD_ASSIGN, DOWNLOAD_SUB, ENROLL_STUDENT, EXIT, GET_ASSIGN, GET_GRADES, GET_SUBMISSIONS, GRADE_SUBMISSON, PROF_COURSES, PROFESSOR, SEARCH_STUDENT_ID, SEARCH_STUDENT_LASTNAME, SEND_EMAIL, STUDENT, STUDENT_COURSES, SUBMIT_ASSIGN, UNENROLL_STUDENT, UPLOAD_ASSIGN

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StudentThread(java.io.BufferedReader sIn, java.io.PrintWriter sOut, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oOut, java.io.ObjectInputStream oIn, DatabaseHelper data)
      Constructs thread with socket connections to the client along with the database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downloadAssignment()
      Read the selected assignment from the client and retrieves the assignment file from the server assignment files and sends it as a file container to the client.
      void exitThread()
      Exits the thread by closing all input output streams.
      void getGrades()
      Read the student enrollment from the client and construct a list of dropbox submissions for the assignment.
      void getStudentAssignments()
      Reads the course from the client and constructs an arraylist of assignments enrolled in the course and sends it back to the client.
      void getStudentCourses()
      Reads the course id from the client and constructs an arraylist of students enrolled in the course and sends it back to the client.
      void readOperation()
      Reads the connection with a series of if statements to execute the proper method for the operation.
      void run()
      run the thread by continuously reading the operations being sent from the client and executing the operation in readOperation().
      void sendEmail()
      Read email from the client and constructs a email helper to send emails to the professor.
      void submitAssignment()
      Uploads an assignment from the client by receiving a submission file and storing it in the servers submissions file path.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentThread

        public StudentThread(java.io.BufferedReader sIn,
                     java.io.PrintWriter sOut,
                     java.io.ObjectOutputStream oOut,
                     java.io.ObjectInputStream oIn,
                     DatabaseHelper data)
        Constructs thread with socket connections to the client along with the database
        Parameters:
        sIn - string in
        sOut - string out
        oOut - object out
        oIn - object in
        data - database

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        run the thread by continuously reading the operations being sent from the client and executing the operation in readOperation(). Loop exits if client closes connection.

      • readOperation

        public void readOperation()
        Reads the connection with a series of if statements to execute the proper method for the operation.

      • getStudentCourses

        public void getStudentCourses()
        Reads the course id from the client and constructs an arraylist of students enrolled in the course and sends it back to the client.

      • getStudentAssignments

        public void getStudentAssignments()
        Reads the course from the client and constructs an arraylist of assignments enrolled in the course and sends it back to the client.

      • downloadAssignment

        public void downloadAssignment()
        Read the selected assignment from the client and retrieves the assignment file from the server assignment files and sends it as a file container to the client.

      • submitAssignment

        public void submitAssignment()
        Uploads an assignment from the client by receiving a submission file and storing it in the servers submissions file path. Server constructs a submission from the file and inserts it into the database.

      • getGrades

        public void getGrades()
        Read the student enrollment from the client and construct a list of dropbox submissions for the assignment. the dropbox submissions are sent back to the client to display grades.

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail()
        Read email from the client and constructs a email helper to send emails to the professor.

      • exitThread

        public void exitThread()
        Exits the thread by closing all input output streams. Sets checkEnd to true;
